data.text:
Publish date: 2024-05-17

The former actress, model, and singer Bridgette Wilson is best known to her admirers as the spouse of tennis player Pete Sampras. In 1990, she also took home the Miss Teen USA crown. She had simultaneously pursued careers in performing and modeling.

What is the Net Worth of Bridgette Wilson? Salary, Earnings

As of March 2023, the former actress had a net value of about $30 million. Her job as an actress and former Miss Teen USA winner has done a lot to increase her net worth. The publication of two albums has also raised her worth. Before 2010, Bridgette and her husband chose to sell their enormous mansion for $25,000,000.

2013 saw triumph, but the price was kept a secret. In addition, they received $14.5 million for their Beverly Hills home. Although it hasnât been confirmed, Bridgette Wilsonâs primary motivation for quitting acting may have been her desire to be a good housewife and mother to her boys. Adam Levine subsequently paid $34,000,000. Her acting days may have been numbered because she frequently stated that she wished to be a stay-at-home mom since 1993.

Where was Bridgette Wilson born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

She was born on September 25, 1973, as Bridgette Wilson. She was born to his parents, Dale and Kathy Wilson. Along with her younger sibling Tracy Wilson, she was both born and raised in Oregon. As a young child, Bridgette was drawn to modeling and wanted to make a profession out of it.

In 1990, she started training for the Miss Teen USA pageant. Her endeavors were rewarded, and she received a crown. She had just turned 17 at the time. In 1991, Bridgette received her diploma from the esteemed Gold Beach High School. She used to play volleyball for her secondary school team.

Is Bridgette Wilson Single? Relationship

Pete Sampras and Bridgette Wilson are wed. In September 2000, Bridgette wed Pete Sampras, a tennis star. The pair had a son in 2002. They had their second kid in July, three years later.

How tall is Bridgette Wilson? Weight, Hair Color

As of 2022, Bridgette Wilson will be 49 years old. She was born on September 25, 1973. She stands 1.75 m tall and weighs 59 kg.

How did Bridgette Wilson start her Professional Career?

After triumphing over nearly 50 other candidates to win Miss Teen USA in 1990, Bridgette Wilson started her acting career. The part of Lisa Fennimore in the television show Santa Barbara was originally offered to her. Then, she was allowed to play Ginger in the hit TV series Saved By The Bell.

In 1993, Bridgette made her dÃ©but on the big screen as the lead in the movie Last Action Hero. Over two years, she made appearances in movies like Nixon, Billy Madison, Mortal Kombat, and others.

In the movies Final Vendetta and Unhooked The Stars from 1996, Bridgette made an appearance. The Real Blonde, The Stepsister, I Know What You Did Last Summer, Starstruck, The Suburban, House On Haunted Hill, Nevada, and other films and TV programs featured her acting in 1997.

In 2002, she starred in two movies, Buying The Cow and Extreme Ops. She had additionally appeared on CSI: Miami as a guest performer. She later appeared in in movies like Phantom Punch, Signature Series, and Carpoolers. Wilson retired from acting following the 2008 premiere of Phantom Punch.

In 2006, Bridgette was requested to serve as a Miss Universe pageant juror. Along with her performing skills, Bridgette Wilson has a strong voice. I Only Wanna Be With You, her 1994 debut record, was chosen for distribution by the King Records label. Her second album, Gimme A Kiss, was published in 1996. Bridgette also appeared in the 2002 song What Weâre Gonna Do About It by Tommy Shane Steiner.
